mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( reservation_id, start_date, end_date, reservation_date, address, variety, pet_name, phonenumber, sitter, price, reply, create_id, update_id, create_dt, update_dt, del_yn, address_detail ) VALUES ( reservation_seq.NEXTVAL, #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, SYSDATE, #{address}, #{variety}, #{petName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{sitterName}, #{price, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reply, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', #{addressDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_id, start_date, end_date, reservation_date, address, variety, pet_name, phonenumber, sitter, price, reply, create_id, update_id, create_dt, update_dt, del_yn, address_detail FROM reservation WHERE del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC
